title: Vanderbilt Mansion National Historic Site: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore         The Pavilion Shop at Vanderbilt NHS ML   The Roosevelt-Vanderbilt Historical Association is responsible for the gift shops located in the Vanderbilt Pavilion on the Vanderbilt Estate and at Eleanor Roosevelt's Val-Kill. They sell a variety of items relating to the Hudson Valley, Roosevelts,         Vanderbilts, and the National Park Service. The purchases made at any of  the Roosevelt-Vanderbilt Historical Association sales outlets help support interpretive, educational, and visitor service programs at the individual parks in Hyde Park. For more information call 845-229-9300. Visit their website at: rooseveltvanderbilt.org
